ema hotalaye pawena awanhal, pihinum thatakayak, nawathan ganimata kamara, wiweka sthana aadi pahasukam rasak thibenawa.

ohu athadanguwata ganimen anathuruwa aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa wetha bara di athi bawa ada derana warthakaru pawasayi. 2010 janawari masa 16 wana dina puththalama, madurankulama pradeshaye di pudgalayeku wedi thaba ghathanaya kirimak sambandhayen sabhapathiwarayata naduwak pawathina bawath, ema hethuwen wides gaman thahanam karamin puththalama, mahadhikaranaya wisin thinduwak laba di athi bawa da wartha weyi.

mehi yatama padi pele "sandata thani rakinnata nagena ira bata tharuwa payawi ikmanin mage hitha kiyanawa aatha peradiga ahase guru tharuwa nagena thurumage hitha thamath maga bala innawa"ee kawiye"payawi ikmanin mage hitha kiyanawa" yana padeta etharamma galapimak denna "mage hitha thamath maga bala innawa"samaharawita akkage kawi githa aarak ganna nisamado ehemawuye.kalin sujiwa ayiya kiwwa wage kawiye akuru gananin thalaya ganna krame nathinam chandas kramaya anuwa "ikmanin" kiyana wachane akuru 5k thiyenawa.namuth yata peliye akuru 5ka wachanayak nathi nisa samaharawita rasayata badhawak wenawa yayi sithami(mama niwaradimada kiya nodanimi) ee kawiya thawa parak gayana karala balanna.ee kawiya mehema liwothinsandata thani rakinnata nagena ira bata tharuwa payawi ikmanin mage hitha kiyanawa aatha peradiga ahase guru tharuwa nagena thuruthawama maga balaminma hitha mage innawa
